definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I think we should go into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我們還是回到那個山洞。

sentences.english: The entrance to the cave was infilled by the landowner.
sentences.chinese: 山洞的入口被地產的主人給堵上了。

sentences.english: About noon the robbers visited their cave.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午強盜們來視察他們的山洞了。

sentences.english: In Jinyong s novels there are massive cave images.
sentences.chinese: 金庸小說中存在着大量的山洞意象。

sentences.english: They do not wear clothes, just banana leaves and they live in caves.
sentences.chinese: 他們不穿衣服，只圍着香蕉葉，住在山洞裏。

sentences.english: They lived in caves, hunted animals and gathered fruit.
sentences.chinese: 他們住在山洞裏，獵取野獸，採集果子。

sentences.english: What is the allegory of the Cave of Plato?
sentences.chinese: 柏拉圖的山洞之喻是指什麼？

sentences.english: The next day , Kasim went to the cave.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，凱西姆來到山洞。

sentences.english: I live in places like caves and hollow trees. I also might hang under the awnings of buildings.
sentences.chinese: 我住在山洞和樹洞中，也可能掛在建築物的遮陽棚下。

sentences.english: Some would even say that my normally cave troll-like personality has become even more grim.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有人說我的山洞巨怪性格越來越嚴重了。

sentences.english: The cave is pitch-dark. You can't see anything.
sentences.chinese: 山洞裏黢黑，什麼也看不見。

sentences.english: Thanks to his assistance, we got out of the dark cave safely.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有他幫助，我們才安全地走出漆黑的山洞。
今晚，我們將睡在山洞裏。

sentences.english: I just wanted to drive up to the mountains, hide in a cave, and never come out.
sentences.chinese: 我只想一個人到山裏找個山洞躲起來，再也不出來了。

sentences.english: When day appeared the serpents retired, and I came out of the cave trembling.
sentences.chinese: 當天亮時蟒蛇回去休息了，我顫抖的從山洞出來。

sentences.english: Why don’t we go through the cave?
sentences.chinese: 我們爲什麼不沿着原來的山洞走呢？

definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
